summary:
Dragons Nest Ruin
The home of Dragonborn
descriptionHtml:
Dragons Nest Ruin v1.0a
===================
A plugin for Â "The Elder Scrolls V, Skyrim"
Description:
=========
Dragons Nest was built at the top of the mountain north of Dragon Bridge.
Now the old fort is a ruin, But a suitable place for the Dragonborn.
The key to your new home is near the doormat.
On the outside are all the crafting tools you need.
All the storage containers/cupboards/drawers/chests/barrels are safe (non respawning).
Features:
=======
* A new player home near Dragon Bridge.
* Several decorated rooms, including a secret room.
* Living room, Library, kitchen/storage room, 2 sleeping rooms.
* 2 mannequins, several weapon/shield plaques and display cases.
* Arcane enchanting and alchemy lab tables.
* All needed crafting equipment.
* Suitable for followers.
* Map icon for fast travel.
Requirements:
===========
* Skyrim.esm
* Update.esm
Install:
=====
* Unzip the files into your "Skyrim\Data\" directory.
* Or use the nexus mod manager.
* Or subscribe in workshop.
When you run Skyrim, click on Data Files, and make sure that DNR_Vet_v1.0a is selected, then play the game.
Uninstall:
=======
* Delete DNR_Vet_v1.0a from your "Skyrim\Data\" directory.
* Or uninstall with the nexus mod manager.
* Or unsubscribe in workshop.
Compatibility:
==========
* This mod may not be compatible with other mods that change the area used by this mod.
* Mod is cleaned with TES5Edit.
Credits:
======
Bethesda for this great game.
Cheeseonion for support and efforts.
Niveus and Zerathos dagon for beta testing.
RavegedPyro for his spotlight video.
recommended Mods:
================
